definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Ink to write that, should hide the facts written in blood.
sentences.chinese: 墨写的谎说，决掩不住血写的事实。

sentences.english: The impact goes far beyond mere sniffles and inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 影响决不仅仅是鼻塞或者不适那么简单。

sentences.english: The imperialists will never lay down their butcher knives.
sentences.chinese: 帝国主义分子决不肯放下屠刀。

sentences.english: But while that Tree flourishes she will never come down into Narnia.
sentences.chinese: 但只要这棵树枝繁叶茂，她就决不敢进入纳尼亚。

sentences.english: This was our only exposure to the complexities of the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 我们面临中东的复杂局面，决不仅仅是只此一次。

sentences.english: The stage is set for a gruesome battle between the two nemeses, but only one can survive.
sentences.chinese: 最后的决死战，只有一个能生存下去。

sentences.english: Go against a foolish man, and he knoweth not the lips of prudence.
sentences.chinese: 你应远离愚昧的人，由他口中决得不到明哲。

sentences.english: This problem deserves our full attention. It's not to be shrugged off.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题值得我们关注，决不可等闲视之。

sentences.english: never lie, cheat or steal, always strike a fair deal.
sentences.chinese: 决没有说谎，欺瞒或偷窃，苦守平正生意业务。

sentences.english: Vitamin C is much more than just a tonic for resisting colds.
sentences.chinese: 维生素C决不仅仅是可以御寒的补药。

sentences.english: There is no world for escapists.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界决没有逃避主义者的容身之地。

sentences.english: Wrapt up in a cloak of politeness, she seemed determined to hazard nothing.
sentences.chinese: 她裹着一层礼貌的外衣，好像决不肯贸然开口。

sentences.english: And hear the indorsement of all, and do not object to it.
sentences.chinese: 只听到称心和如意，决不敢有所反对。

sentences.english: Any resolution passed at a shareholder convention abusing majority law sho…
sentences.chinese: 滥用多数决的股东大会决议，其效力应认定为无效。

sentences.english: If Japan were to fall into a deflationary trap, it would not suffer alone.
sentences.chinese: 如果日本跌入通缩陷阱，遭受痛苦的决不止他一个。

definition: to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
to make a move (in martial arts or figuratively)
to concentrate/to think what you're doing
lit. to reverse the rotation of the sky/fig. to reverse a desperate situation
